info.author: Philip Pavlik (email ppavlik@memphis.edu directly with bug reprots for this component)
info.abstract: The Temporal Knowledge Tracing (TKT) model performs a logistic regression over the "error rate" learning curve data.
info.description: TKT is a generalization of the additive factors model (AFM). Experimental.
info.options: Requires 2 KC models, subordinate and superordinate.
